[[col:yellow]]Armour[[/col]]||All forged equipment will be added to your magic items pool; characters can be equipped with items from their Character Details panel.

[[col:yellow]]Artefact Vault[[/col]]||Select any Artefact part to reveal its location.\\n\\nTo retrieve Artefact parts, their locations must be occupied or controlled via military alliances. Once both parts of an Artefact have been collected it can be reforged to grant its benefits.

[[col:yellow]]Banner Runes[[/col]]||Banner and Engineering Runes can be equipped by [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords and then assigned to their units in the Pre-Battle panel. Unlike other equipment, Banners and Runes can only be crafted once each but most will provide multiple Runes.

[[col:yellow]]Character Runes[[/col]]||Character Runes can be equipped by any character to enhance their personal combat abilities. Unlike other equipment, Character Runes can only be crafted once each but most will provide multiple Runes.
